name: Dive Another Way
description:
Synchronise your diving with a friend by throwing your phones into the air to receive a score based on technicality, jump height and synchronicity . We take no responsibility for property damages. Play at your own risk. Water not included/required.

v1.05 A Splash of Colour!
- Splash screen
- Character selection tweaks

Made by Max Wrighton, Gian Dbeis, Remy Stuurwold, Svavar Melberg
Music by Milan Grajetzki
Initially created for Exile Game Jam 2015.
